item.description:
Pho Boston's reputation is well deserved in the W. Hartford area (Elmwood). If you're in the mood for healthy, satisfying fare this is a restaurant you don't want to miss. The menu is quite extensive and the food is really, really good. The cold weather makes it a great time to try from their variety of huge bowls of beef, chicken or veggie soups. The appetizers, and noodle dishes are great too. (This is my favorite restaurant, can you tell?).
Reviews here

--Judy, Organizer

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Pho Boston - West Hartford
